divs: sighting detailsinside home ready for bed, i took the dogs outside at tenthirty and immediately noticed to the west southwest five yellowish lights hovering stationary at various altitudes over what seemed like gilbert or chandler az from my perspective. our property is at a much higher elevation than the rest of the phoenix valley as we are located on the western face of superstition mountain. i would estimate the distance to these lights as fifteen to twenty miles away. these lights were not in any approach vector for sky harbor or other airports. i noticed some move vertically and then seem to implode and or vanish completely to only reappear moving right then back left. this was not aircraft and it sure as hell was not flares. i woke up my wife and daughter and we all looked with a 60 millimeter telescope. one was stationary for at least five minutes not moving or changing at all, then it disappeard, or at least went dark, to reappear within one minute and then moved from side to side. there were several appearing and dissapearing randomly. at the same time as this there were a few carriers approaching sky harbor from the standard east north east vector approach. these aircraft had to see these lights. the carriers had the standard color of lights, therefore it is not possible for the yellowish lights to be created from pollution or other atmospheric conditions... no way. at approx.10:55 pm the lights simply turned off and did not reappear for at least 15 minutes. we came inside, discussed this and decided to report this at this website. i have not reported to this or any other organization in the past. i did not report when myself and 5 other friends witnessed the now famous "phx lights" in 1997 either... but we saw them i would swear to it in any courtroom as sure as we saw this tonight. i was a naval aviator in the 80's. i know aircraft very well and this is simply unexplainable to me\us at this time.
Summary: numerous yellowish lights, not aircraft, hovering, moving, imploding, disappearing/reappearing. 5 at once. then only two, then one. Im ex naval aviator... woke up wife, whole family observed this. Had to be mass witnesses
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around July 20th 2006
